name: A young man stands in his bedroom
name_original: A young man stands in his bedroom
description:
A young man stands in his bedroom. It just so happens that today, the 12th of April, 2009, is the day before this young man's birthday. Almost thirteen years ago he was given life, and tomorrow it will change forever. Though the adventures that await him are far greater than anything that will happen today, he doesn't know that just yet. Today will be just another normal day for him and his friends.

What will he do?

THIS IS A DEMO. NOT THE FINAL PRODUCT.

Right now only John and Dave are playable. There are some pickable objects to test the Sylladex mechanics.

Also, once the Pesterchum conversation is done, press the Interact button to exit.

Linux version coming soon. Linux version already here!

Please feel free to report any bugs you may find.

KNOWN BUGS:

  • Sometimes pickable objects respawn when they shouldn't. I'm working on it. Fixed.

CONTROLS:

ActionKeyboard
Gamepad (XBox)
InteractZX
Pick up objectXACancel
CBOpen Sylladex
EYMoveArrowsLeft Stick
Navigate Pesterchum
ArrowsD-PadToggle Fullscreen
Escape
